potential_duplicates.title: [MooreToCore] Crash with sqrt/floor
potential_duplicates.analysis: Same assertion message 'dyn_cast on a non-existent value' in MooreToCore pass, but triggered by ConversionOp (real type) not SVModuleOp (union port type). Different root cause.

potential_duplicates.title: [ImportVerilog] Union type in call
potential_duplicates.analysis: Related to union type but different error (operand type mismatch in func.call), not a type conversion crash.

potential_duplicates.title: [HW] Roundtrip test fail for !hw.union
potential_duplicates.analysis: HW dialect union parsing issue, unrelated to MooreToCore conversion.

potential_duplicates.title: Union type
potential_duplicates.analysis: Feature discussion about adding union type to HW dialect, historical context only.

potential_duplicates.title: [MooreToCore] VariableOp lowered failed
potential_duplicates.analysis: MooreToCore struct type conversion issue, related pattern but different type (struct vs union).

recommendation_reason: No existing issue reports missing UnionType converter in MooreToCore. Issue #8930 has same assertion but different trigger (real type vs union type). This is a distinct missing feature.
